description: This file defines a mock class Store2Mock for the IStore2 interface using Google Mock, along with a notification mock class Store2NotificationMock. It facilitates unit testing of components that depend on IStore2 by providing mock implementations of its methods and notifications.

classes.name: Store2Mock
classes.description: Mock implementation of the IStore2 interface for unit testing, using Google Mock to mock methods related to key-value store operations and notification management.

classes.name: Store2NotificationMock
classes.description: Mock implementation of the IStore2::INotification interface for testing notification mechanisms.

methods.name: Store2Mock
methods.description: Default constructor for the Store2Mock class.

methods.name: ~Store2Mock
methods.description: Default destructor for the Store2Mock class.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks the registration of a notification callback.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks the unregistration of a notification callback.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Mocks setting a value in the store with scope, namespace, key, value, and TTL.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Mocks retrieving a value and TTL from the store.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Mocks deleting a key from the store.

methods.name: DeleteNamespace
methods.description: Mocks deleting a namespace from the store.
